channel.title: Cybersecurity, Cloud and WebAssembly
channel.description: Insights into Cybersecurity, Cloud computing, and WebAssembly

item.title: An IAM Split-Privilege Model with Terraform for Robust Cybersecurity
item.description: A practical guide to enhancing cloud security by implementing a split-privilege model in AWS IAM using Terraform, inspired by the insightful work of Dylan Shields in his book "AWS Security".
item.author: bGl3ZWlqaWFuLmh1c3RAZ21haWwuY29t@decode-in-base64 (Supa Safe)

item.title: Harnessing AWS IAM and Terraform for Enhanced Cybersecurity
item.description: Explore how to strengthen your cloud security by effectively managing AWS IAM components (users, policies, groups and roles) using Terraform, a powerful Infrastructure as Code tool.
item.author: bGl3ZWlqaWFuLmh1c3RAZ21haWwuY29t@decode-in-base64 (Supa Safe)

item.title: Terraform and Cybersecurity: A Chill Intro
item.description: Learn about the benefits of using Terraform to manage infrastructure at large technology companies, with a focus on improving cybersecurity.
item.author: bGl3ZWlqaWFuLmh1c3RAZ21haWwuY29t@decode-in-base64 (Supa Safe)
